Class TaskContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.vrom.roo.validator.core.TaskContext
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ReporterContext, ValidatorContext

    public class TaskContext
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains general context information.

      • getTaskHistory

        protected java.util.List<TaskValueObject> getTaskHistory()
        Returns:
        all task executed The list is protected against changes since other methods are used for manipulation of the task history.
        See Also:
        setCurrentTask(AbstractTask), removeTaskFromHistory(AbstractTask)
